name: Wicked Sorcerers
description:
Wicked Sorcerers is a gender select visual novel dating simulation set in a fantasy world resort. Experience all the luxuries paradise has to offer while winning the affections of your favorite demon sorcerer! Oh, and don't forget you're the judge to a possibly planet changing magic competition - make your choices wisely!

Follow Along Development on Twitter & Patreon!

Want to join a fantasy world ruled by demons and the arcane arts? Where one's ability to harness magic and power can determine not only their class, but their entire livelihoods? Well, fortunately in the land of Astor, you just happen to be one of the most renown and powerful witches in the world... 

Unfortunately, things haven't really been exciting for you this past decade. After lending your hand and changing the fate of thousands in the Great War to reunify Eskos... You've become a little bit of a hermit. Your job teaching at the Western Elms University has become tirelessly boring. The Education Board refuses to subsidize your efforts towards research. And most of your nights are spent heating up a bowl of Pumpkin Rolls to snack on while binging Astor's Finest Detectives alone. Honestly, it's been ages since you've last set aside your work or studies!

Then, one day, you receive a letter. 

It's an invitation to be the honored host of a grand magic competition - one that's in production to be televised across the nine realms! And better yet, it's hosted at the Fields of Paradise Resort & Hotel Palace, an oasis many pray to see but few ever do. With an all inclusive offer to explore the greatest gifts of a lifetime, you take your trusty broomstick and head off to the capital! Perhaps this month long vacation will bring great opportunities to your door - maybe even a new budding romance?
